rpg.item

Class Purse

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.item.ItemImplementation
      • rpg.item.Container
        • rpg.item.Purse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, Parent

    public class Purse
extends Container
    A class of purses. a purse is a container that only contains dukats
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic

      • addPurse

        public void addPurse(Purse other)
        Add all the dukats of the given purse to this purse
        Parameters:
        other - The purse to transfer the dukats from
        Throws:
        IllegalAddItemException(this, - other) The sum of the weight of the dukats in this purse and the other purse exceed the capacity of this purse | ( getTotalWeight().subtract(getWeight()) ) | .add( (other.getTotalWeight()).subtract(other.getWeight()) | .compareTo(getCapacity())>0
